18 template<typename T>
19 void readDivisionSpace(Division_Euclidean_space<T>& ds, char* filename) {
20  std::ifstream infile;
21  int N = 0;
22  int D;
23 
24  infile.open(filename);
25  if (!infile)
26  std::cout << "File not found!" << std::endl;
27  // Read first line of file
28  infile >> D;
29  if (D < 1) {
30  std::cout << "ERROR, dimension less than one!!\n\n";
31  return;
32  }
33  infile >> N;
34  if (N < 1) {
35  std::cout << "ERROR, number of points less than 1!!\n\n";
36  return;
37  }
38 
39  ds.setSize((size_t&)N);
40  ds.setDim(D);
41 
42  int hRead = 0;
43  float coord;
44  for (int n = 0; n < N && infile; ++n) {
45  for (int i = 0; i < D; ++i) {
46  infile >> coord;
47  ds.insert(coord);
48  }
49  hRead++;
50  }
51  if (hRead != N)
52  std::cout << "ERROR, read less than " << N << " points!!\n\n";
53 }

96 template<typename T>
97 void readDivisionSpacefvecs(Division_Euclidean_space<T>& ds, int& N, int& D, char* filename) {
98  FILE* fid;
99  fid = fopen(filename, "rb");
100 
101  if (!fid) {
102  printf("I/O error : Unable to open the file %s\n", filename);
103  std::cerr << "Error: " << strerror(errno) << std::endl;
104  }
105 
106  // we assign the return value of fread() to 'sz' just to suppress a warning
107  size_t sz = fread(&D, sizeof(D), 1, fid);
108  fseek(fid, 0L, SEEK_END);
109  sz = ftell(fid);
110  N = sz / (1 * 4 + D * 4);
111  //printf("N = %d, D = %d, |%s|\n", N, D, filename);
112 
113  fseek(fid, 0L, SEEK_SET);
114  ds.setSize(N);
115  ds.setDim(D);
116  //std::cout << ds.dim() << " " << ds.size() << "\n";
117  int c = 0;
118  float v;
119  int i, j;
120  for(i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
121  sz = fread(&D, sizeof(D), 1, fid);
122  //printf("%d\n", D);
123  for (j = 0; j < D; ++j) {
124  sz = fread(&v, sizeof(v), 1, fid);
125  //if(c >= 279619)
126  //printf("j = %d, v = %f, read up to point %d\n", j, v, c);
127  ds.insert(v,c);
128  }
129  ++c;
130  //printf("read up to %d\n", c);
131  }
132  if(c != N)
133  printf("WARNING! Read less points than expected.\n");
134 }
135 
136 /*
137 j = 255, v = 0.052300, read up to point 279620
138 j = 256, v = 0.052300, read up to point 279620
139 terminate called after throwing an instance of 'std::bad_alloc'
140  what(): std::bad_alloc
141 Aborted
142 Dataset: 500,000 points in 960 dimensions.
143 */

156 template<typename T>
157 void read_points(std::vector< Point<Division_Euclidean_space<T>> >& v, int N, int D, const char* filename) {
158  std::ifstream infile;
159 
160  infile.open(filename);
161  if (!infile)
162  std::cout << "File not found!" << std::endl;
163 
164  int hRead = 0;
165  T coords[D];
166  for (int n = 0; n < N && infile; ++n) {
167  for (int i = 0; i < D; ++i)
168  infile >> coords[i];
169  Point<Division_Euclidean_space<T> > p(D, coords);
170  v.push_back(p);
171  hRead++;
172  }
173  if (hRead != N)
174  std::cout << "ERROR, read less than " << N << " points!!\n\n";
175 }
176 
187 template<typename T>
188 void read_points(std::vector< std::vector<T> >& v, int N, int D, const char* filename) {
189  std::ifstream infile;
190 
191  infile.open(filename);
192  if (!infile)
193  std::cout << "File not found!" << std::endl;
194 
195  v.resize(N);
196  int hRead = 0;
197  T coord;
198  for (int n = 0; n < N && infile; ++n) {
199  for (int i = 0; i < D; ++i) {
200  infile >> coord;
201  v[n].push_back(coord);
202  }
203  hRead++;
204  }
205  if (hRead != N)
206  std::cout << "ERROR, read less than " << N << " points!!\n\n";
207 }

219 void read_indices(std::vector<std::vector<int> >& v, int N, int k, const char* filename) {
220  std::ifstream infile;
221 
222  infile.open(filename);
223  if (!infile)
224  std::cout << "File not found!" << std::endl;
225 
226  v.resize(N);
227  int hRead = 0;
228  int index;
229  for (int n = 0; n < N && infile; ++n) {
230  for (int i = 0; i < k; ++i) {
231  infile >> index;
232  v[n].push_back(index);
233  }
234  hRead++;
235  }
236  if (hRead != N)
237  std::cout << "ERROR, read less than " << N << " indices!!\n\n";
238 }

245 void print_vector(std::vector<T>& v) {
246  for(int i = 0; i < v.size(); ++i) {
247  std::cout << v[i] << std::endl;
248  }
